name: learnosity-to-qti
description: - go here : http://windows.php.net/download - get the 5.6 one - not sure about the threrads - unzip - find the php.ini-development or production (i did development) - copy and rename to just php.ini - then edit that file 	- uncomment 734 		- extension_dir = "ext" 	- uncomment line 903 		- extension=php_openssl.dll - add php folder to path - cli vs cgi?  	- http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15597067/how-to-run-php-from-windows-command-line 	- http://php.net/manual/en/features.commandline.php 	- http://php.net/manual/en/features.commandline.introduction.php
author: Joshua McKinney
